column1: good length at off stump, from over the wicket. Taps it back to the bowler from the crease
length on off stump, gets on the back foot and whips it through the open midwicket region. Looks like Bravo moved out of there after setting the field
sharp stumping down leg side as Dunk leans in and misses this wide. No appeal.

traps him on the knee roll after beating the inside edge. It looks very plumb on first look. Hence the big appeal. Hence, the signal for out. Looks a close on replay. It hit him on a middle and leg line and it was angling in from around the wicket, remember. Ah, tracking shows it was clipping leg stump. Fair call. Another cheap end for Dunk
length and shaping away in the air outside off. Leans in and drives it to mid-off's right
back of a length in the corridor, hurriedly tapped back down the pitch
length at leg stump, steps out and clips to deep midwicket
good length outside off, pushed to extra cover with a big stride
good length skidder coming in at middle stump, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
length on off stump, steps out and drives. Can't beat the bowler in his follow through
good length on off, steps out and bunts it wide of mid-on
inside edge as KP steps out and can't make the pitch. It's drifting down leg and he has to reach out a long way to try and whip this. Runs past Hogg at short fine
length outside off, mistimed angled-bat drive out to long-off
back of a length in the corridor, tapped to extra cover on the up
beaten by a slower ball that drifts away in the corridor on a length. He's looking to go hard at this, stabbing well in front of the body. Cuts away from him
shot. Good length in the corridor again. Punches hard at it again and this time he manages to hammer it between bowler and mid-off
good length on off stump, plonks the front leg across and steals a single with a dab to midwicket
outside edge and past the keeper's outstretched right hand. Handscomb gets inside the line as well as he looks to drive a full one in the corridor
short and just outside off, sliced to third man
good length ball, floated up outside off. Steps out and is forced to block
back of a length in the corridor, lets it come on and punches to long-on
good length at middle stump, pushed back down the pitch
back of a length at middle stump, goes deep in the crease and whips to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, opens the face and chops it to short third man
leading edge into the covers as he looks to reverse sweep. Another ball floated up at a length outside off

slogs across the line and gets it high over mid-on. Length ball tossed up on middle. No fielder there so he didn't bother getting to the pitch. Just went through the line and got it to the boundary on the bounce
clips it over the long-on boundary this time. Much fuller and much flatter from Holland. Skids into him and he uses the angle to help it over the fence
back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
good length at middle stump, shuffles and scoops it between square leg and short fie on the rise
oh beautiful. Handscomb gets on top of this ball with a big stride to reach it outside off, then rolls his wrists overs it to find the gap between square and short fine with a sweep
89kph slower ball at a length on middle. Waits and waits before driving to long-on on the rise
slower ball goes wrong, reaches Handscomb on the full at a leg stump line. He stands tall and whips it to the square leg boundary
slower ball on middle stump, clips it to deep square
full toss, an outswinger wide outside off. Looks to drive but gets it off the toe-end of the bat
slower ball, full on middle stump. Pokes it towards midwicket and steals a single from Nabi. Barely. His bat got stuck in the turf as he looked to slide it in. Might have been out had the throw hit
good length outside off, slices it wide of short third man
full outside off stump, driven on the up to long-off
good length just outside off, mistimed cover drive on the up. Rolls in front of sweeper cover
slower ball, short and wide. Slapped on the up to sweeper cover
good length on off stump, driven to long-off on the rise
beautiful. Stays deep in the crease and allows this back of a length ball to come in. Carves it past short third man
drops a slower ball short outside off. Sits up for him and he cuts hard. Aerial and to point's right, but enough on it to beat his dive
floated up outside off, driven down to long-off
power from KP. An old-fashioned, powerful slog over midwicket. Tossed up at middle stump, gets the front leg to the pitch and clears the boundary
shapes to slog again but picks the googly and opens the face. Slices it out to sweeper
full on off stump, driven to long-off
flat and full on leg stump, shuffles and tickles this to short fine's right

superb sweeping from Handscomb so far. Another one comes out. Against the turn as Hogg floats a googly up outside off. Picks it from out there with a big stride and hits along the floor to bisect deep square and deep midwicket
yorker just outside off, jams it out to extra cover
slower ball, full on middle stump. Flicks and finds short fine
slower ball, full and in at leg stump. Flicks to deep midwicket's right

flat and over deep square. Lines up early, as if he knows the slower ball is coming. Standing back and across in the crease. The slower ball does come, it's short, and he pulls it flat to clear the boundary
fifty as he comes back for the second. He's in the zone. Taps a slower ball into the vacant midwicket area with soft hands and beats the throw
low full toss at leg stump, tapped to long-on
low full toss on leg stump, mistimes the slog. Gets it out to deep square off the inside half
slower ball outside off, back of a length, tapped to point's right on the up
full and down leg side. Can't get bat on the flick. Or so the umpire thinks as he turns down the caught-behind appeal. No wide
full at leg stump, driven uppishly to long-on
slower ball, full outside off. Messes with his flow as he looks to drive. He gets it out to long-off
slower ball on a length outside off, driven on the up to sweeper cover
full at middle stump, swings across the line and gets it out to deep midwicket off the inside half
slower ball on leg stump, steps out and mistimes the attempted hoick. Single to long-on
overpitched on middle stump, driven to long-on
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Driven on the up to sweeper cover

sensational effort from Bravo at extra cover, but he can't hold onto the catch. Handscomb steps out and meets the length ball on the pitch to try and get it wide of mid-off. He's middled it and it's travelling really quickly to Bravo's right. He dives one-handed and slightly backwards, to his right. Can't get to it
full at off stump, drills it over the bowler and to mid-off's right. Can't beat long-on though

that's a huge hit. 92 metres. Lines up for the line and length - doesn't matter which way it's turning. His back leg is in front of off, front leg middle and leg. Whacks across the line as he gets a full one on middle. Midwicket boundary again
whew. Is it 2007? Pietersen has completely thrown the bowler off his line. This is a short ball going down leg side. He swivels and hoicks it over the long leg fence
length and pushed through at middle stump. KP sitting on the back foot is forced to quickly adjust and stab this into the leg side
short and wide outside off, carved out to the sweeper
length and pushed through at leg stump, swivels and pulls out an ugly heave. Can't beat backward square's dive
full on leg stump, flicked to deep square
good length outside off, steps out and hammers it on the up to sweeper cover
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Chops it straight to point
low full toss at middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket off the toe-end
slower ball, full on leg stump. Swipes across the line and gets it out to deep midwicket
good length and wide outside off. Steps out, makes too much room and can't get bat on it as he stretches out
well bowled. Finishes a great over with the best ball. Slower yorker outside off, sneaks through from under KP's slog
finds deep midwicket with the slog sweep and Nabi strikes again. He's connected nicely on this after a big stride outside off. But it's flat to the fielder's right and easily taken
full and just outside off, driven to long-off
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
full on leg stump, drills it, couple of bounces, to long-on
short and wide outside off, sliced to sweeper cover
short ball outside off, cut to sweeper
yorker just outside off, digs it out into the cover region
slower ball, back of a length in the corridor. Opens the face and runs it to short third man's left

gets under the pull and slices it high for deep midwicket who takes an easy catch. This is good from Wildermuth. Sustains the pressure built over the last two overs and beats him with a slower ball that's dug in outside off. KP wants to smash this over the midwicket fence off the front foot but gets under it too much
full at off stump, clipped to long-on's right with soft hands
back of a length outside off, shuffles and looks to bunt another one with soft hands through midwicket. The fielder charges in this time and keeps it to one
loopy full toss on leg stump, flicked to deep square
quicker one, 107kph, full and just outside off. Slices it late to sweeper cover
back of a length at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
quicker one again, 109kph, full toss on middle stump. Gets the pull shot off the high end of the bat. It dribbles out to deep midwicket
spears a yorker in at leg stump, forces him to tap it to midwicket
yorker at off stump, deflected into the point area with an open face

good length and in at leg stump. Swings at it and gets it over midwicket. Deep midwicket, who is a bit square out there, sprints to his left and puts in a big dive to his left. Can't get to it as it bounces over the rope
outside edge steered straight to the keeper. It's a slower ball that rises on him as he looks to play the late cut. Easy catch for Ludeman
bouncer in the corridor, left alone
good length in the corridor, looks to punch it through the covers, beaten on the outside edge
good length at off stump, squeezed out to long-off
slower ball, full outside off. Drags it out to long-on off the toe-end

and for the first time in my career, I believe there is such a thing as commentator's curse. Nabi puts down a sitter at extra cover. This is dug in short at off stump, he backs away and has no room to play the cut. Gets it straight to Nabi who grabs at it and can't hang on

drops short of long-on and Bravo isn't happy. Looks like the fielder didn't pick this. It's a full ball at leg stump. He has no room again and he jabs it with a short-arm action. Floats in front of the fielder who dives forward and catches it on the bounce
slower ball, full and wide outside off. Faulkner is through the slog before this ball pitches
full on middle stump, looks to flick, gets a leading edge out to sweeper cover

big full toss as a slower ball goes wrong. Dips in at his thigh. He goes back in the crease and swipes it over the fine leg fence. Protests for the no-ball, but that had dipped enough. A poor ball to end an otherwise superb over
low full toss wide outside off, reaches out and hammers it wide of long-off
low full toss on leg stump, tapped out to long-on
a stylish whip from Maxwell, but there isn't enough pace on the ball. Dropped short of a length and wide outside off, dug in with the fingers. He finds deep midwicket
full and wide outside off, gets into the leg side and reaches out. Gets it off the toe of the bat, to short third man's left
slower full toss outside off, backs away and waits for it to arrive. Slaps it straight to extra cover
lovely shot. Overpitched on off stump, gets the front leg into the leg side and carves it inside-out over extra cover. Beats long-off to his left as well. Great shot on a slow surface like this
slower ball on a length, wide outside off. Gets down on a knee to try and sweep this. But it's too wide for him and he's beaten
slower ball, back of a length outside off. Punches to long-on's right off the back foot
slower ball at a length, well wide of the mark outside off. Faulkner leaves
dropped in his follow through as he sticks his right hand out. Slower ball, overpitched on middle stump and drilled hard towards the umpire. Bravo can only parry it past the non-striker
squeezed between his legs as he looks to get the front leg out of the way against this yorker. It's aimed for middle, he tries to go the helicopter route. Big inside edge
just clears the boundary despite losing balance as he slaps this straight over the bowler. It's a slower ball outside off, he's set up for the leg side but adjusts to get it up and over
whips it with a short backlift from middle stump. Gets it to long-on's right. The fielder over-runs it there but regains his balance to pick it up behind himself with his left hand on the bounce.
some vicious outswing first up. Starts on middle at a good length, swings away sharply towards the corridor. Defended on the front foot
length and swinging away from off stump, gets it to point off the thick outside edge
superb. 141kph, another outswinger. Starts on middle, fizzes away from the corridor as the batsman swings across the line
outside edge flies past slip as he pokes with no feet. Another outswinger from a good length, this one closer to the batsman and at an off stump line
swings it away from the left-hander now. He's showing some skill so far. This one climbs up and angles across the corridor. Stabs at it and is beaten
short and wide outside off, looks to chop it, beaten
nice channel outside off stump, but angling across the right hander, tries to cut this square but plays under the ball. Promising carry through to the keeper
pushes it slightly wider on this occasion. Pitches on a good length but always going away from Ludeman, he tries to reach out and drive but can't get bat to ball
good length on middle stump, too close to his body for the cut, chopped down to wide third man instead
full on off stump, and it's flicked off his toes. Played in the air, but itt's chipped with too little power on it. Gulbis takes a sharp catch at deep midwicket running to his left
full on off stump, firmly driven off the front foot to mid off, they race through for the quick single
full on middle stump, but angling into the batsman in the air, clipped off his pads past square leg with ease
back of a length on the fourth-stump line, tries to pull but too he's got no room to play with, bunted back to the bowler instead off the back foot
good length on middle stump, pulled along the ground to square leg. Not timed well enough, as it trickles down to the fielder

good length outside off and he shimmies down the pitch, tries to carve this inside out but takes the outside edge, it's flying down to the third man boundary but the fielder in the deep puts in a diving effort to his left, stops the boundary
good length on off stump, pulled along the carpet to midwicket. The fielder has to scamper across to stop it from passing through
good length outside off, walks across to the off side and works this towards midwicket
full on middle but coming into Ludeman's pads, flicked elegantly off his legs using his wrists to lift the ball over deep backward point. It's hit well, and it flies into the stands!

full on off stump, angling into the batsman, tries to drive but takes the inside edge onto his pads, the ball's dribbling to point and they're off for the single. Great effort from the fielder, as he underarms his throw, but it just misses the off stump. Tough chance
full on middle stump, tapped off the front foot to midwicket, they scamper through for the run
full on off stump, carved off the front foot square to cover point, good effort from the fielder who dives to his left, but the misfield allows them to take the run
good length on middle stump, and it's whipped off his hips behind square once again! Uses his wrists to smack this over the vacant deep backward-square boundary.
good length on leg stump, slides into the right-hander's pads as he tries to nudge this behind square. Takes his thigh guard

caught on the rebound! Maxi! Full and wide outside off, slashes hard at it, but Maxwell at point displays some hang time! Jumps, sticks his right hand up, the ball hits his palm, and falls safely in his hands as he dives behind to complete the catch. Beautiful
full on middle, tapped down the ground
full on off stump on this occasion, no real spin on offer, driven down to long on
tossed up full on middle stump, zips straight through towards leg stump as the batsman tries to defend off the front foot, takes the thick inside edge to short fine leg
good length on off stump, backs away and cuts it square, but there's three men there for that shot. Straight to cover point
misses the length on this occasion, drops a ripper in front of leg stump, but it's a low full toss, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket

shouts of 'catch it', but short of the man at deep midwicket on this occasion. Falls in front of cow corner, as the fielder races across to his left and stop the four. A full-length ball on middle stump that the batsman chipped over midwicket after coming down the wicket

Another chance! But dropped by KP at short cover! Good length outside off, and it's punched off the back foot, but straight to Pietersen. Doesn't stick in his hands, as it pops out of his hands. Valiant effort but dropped!
full on off stump, mistimed drive to cover
good length on off stump, Short shuffles across to the off side and flicks this along the ground behind square on the leg side, it's hit well and beats the man at deep backward square

more hang time from the fielder! Good length outside off, and he drives hard at it, flashy shot and it takes a thick outside edge. Flies through to short third man who jumps up to complete a sharp take
good length on off stump, worked off his hips to square leg. There's a man there
full on off stump and it's firmly hit down the ground off the front foot, goes past the non-striker and beats mid on as well, work from the man at long off, but he eventually cuts it off
full on off stump, drives it straight back to the bowler. Well stopped on the follow through
tossed up full on off stump, spinning away from the batsman as he drives past the bowler's left to long off
full on middle stump, worked off his toes to the man at square leg
full on off stump, slight spin away from the batsman as he drives it straight, great stop from Fallins as he dives to his left
back of a length on off stump, backs away and cuts, but too fine. Straight to short third man
full on off stump, carved off the front foot but not timed well, dribbles across to cover point
back of a length outside off, opens his bat's face and runs it down to third man. Misfield from the fielder in the deep, and that allows they to steal the second. Sloppy work
back of a length outside off, walks across to the off side and taps it off the back foot to point
back of a length outside off, punched off the front foot to cover
short and wide outside off, enough width to cut this firmly but it stays low this time, the ball goes under his bat as he misses the shot
back of a length outside off, shuffles across to the off side and punches this square off the back foot, goes through to the man at deep backward point
short on leg stump and it goes down the leg side, Hastings falls down on his follow through, on all fours but he's unhurt
good length outside off, comes down the ground to drive through cover, but plays inside the line. Flies past the outside of his bat
misses the length on this occasion, and it's punished! Full toss outside off, and it's smacked over the bowler's head. Lands on top of the sight screen
not afraid to toss it up once again, overpitched on middle stump, and the batsman's cramped for room, dug away to  mid off
flighted full outside off, down on one knee to slog sweep, but mistimes it on this occasion. Played to deep midwicket
Bravo does well to get under the ball! Full outside off and it's muscled down the ground. Bravo does very well to get under the ball, or else he would've been hit on the helmet. Down to long on
full on off stump, carved off the front foot square to deep point
full on off stump, driven hard down the ground, and once again just misses the non-striker. There's the man at long on for that shot
good length on middle stump, too close to his body to play to the off side, but he punches it anyway. Hit to mid off

cheeky! Good-length ball on leg stump, but the batsman was expecting that. Walks across all the way to the off side and paddles this down the keeper's left. Interesting shot, but it's not timed well enough. Cut off by fine leg

oof, KP takes a screamer! It's been slapped off the front foot, but it's in the air. Pietersen jumps across to his right and sticks both hands. Sticks in his palms, as he comes crashing down to Earth after all that anti-gravity stuff
short on leg stump to start off, tentatively pulled off the back foot, takes the top edge, but falls just short of the man running in front fine leg
back of a length outside off, calmly punched off the back foot past cover point
full on middle and off, slight shuffle to the off side but tapped back to the bowler
good length on middle stump, starts off with the offcutter, can't flick this off his hips, takes the thigh pad
back of a length outside off, driven off the back foot past cover. Mistimed

calypso classic! Good length outside off, and he goes deep into the crease, and lifts his punch shot over cover, uses his bottom hand to chip it over the fielder, and that dribbles away to the boundary. Classic DJ shot
back of a length outside off, but slower ball once again, mistimes his punch to cover
short outside off, and it's slapped behind square. Stays on the back foot and cuts it late past point. Terrific hit
full on off stump, uses his wrists to drive this drive this past Nabi to long on

good length on middle stump, backs away and carves this off the back foot over cover point. Didn't look like a controlled shot, but it's hit well into the gap, sliding effort from deep cover, but he can't stop it
slower yorker on off stump, mistimes his drive to mid off. Takes the bottom of his bat
full outside off, smacked down the ground to long off. Nabi wants the second run, but Bravo isn't interested
overpitched slower ball on middle stump, muscled over Faulkner's head this time. Not the best timing from Nabi, but enough muscle behind that shot for it to beat long on running to his left
full on off stump, tries to drive over cover, but the ball slides across the outside of his bat and through to the keeper
short on off stump, and it's wildly pulled by Nabi. Slices his shot, as it flies over the keeper's head. Falls short of third man
Lands on the second tier over cover! Full outside off, and Bravo comes down the ground and smacks it over the off side, 103 metres behind that shot, as it's taken in the crowd! Ridiculous
full outside off, mistimed inside-out drive to cover point
full outside off, opens the bat's face and drives it between cover and mid off
almost a yorker on off stump, squeezed away down the ground to long on
overpitched full on off stump, tapped down the ground with some power to the man at long on
full on off stump, tapped with soft hands to Maxwell at long on. They contemplate taking the double, but choose not to take Maxi's arm on
gets the wicket first ball! Good length outside off, and Bravo tries a wild cross-batted slog. Comes off the toe end, and it's a skyer. Comfortably taken by Maxwell at long on
good length on off stump, angling into the right hander, punched off the front foot to long on. The ball seems to be following Maxi everywhere
back of a length outside off, tapped off his pads with soft hands to midwicket, allows the batsmen to run across
full on off stump, Nabi can't hit this well enough. Bottom edges it back to the bowler

full and wide outside off, slashes hard at the slower ball, and with third man up that's dangerous. Flies over point and takes a couple of bounces into the third-man boundary. Pays off to keep the bat's face open
full outside off, hit back past the bowler to long off
low full toss on off stump, smashed back past Faulkner to the man at long off
full on off stump, walks across to the off stump to get inside the line of the ball, tapped to long on
Nabi shuffles across to the leg side, and Faulkner follows. Full on leg stump, and it's bunted down to long on. They want the second run, and Nabi just manages to complete it

Maxwell's third catch! Full on middle and leg, but Nabi is taking him on this time. Smashes it over the bowler's head but he did not get full under the ball. Hit well, but doesn't have the distance. Down Maxi's throat at long on
full on middle stump, tapped to midwicket
full on off stump, worked off his pads past square leg, effort for deep midwicket as he races right in, and stops the second
full on middle stump, turned off his pads to fine leg
full outside off, bunted down the ground to mid off. Not timed well
back of the hand ball outside off, but too short. WIldermuth gets width first ball, and it's crunched square off the back foot. Flies across to the deep point boundary
back of a length on middle stump, worked off his hips to the vacant midwicket region, they want the second run and they get it with ease
good length on middle stump, worked off his pads to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, angling into the batsman, opens his bat's face and glances it down to short third man
back of a length outside off, pulled with a lot of power behind that shot, but mistimes it on this occasion. Dribbles across to the man at cow corner
full outside off, and it's smacked square on the leg side. Hit to deep midwicket
overpitched outside off stump, and it's muscled down the ground to Maxwell at long on
waist-high full toss outside off stump, slogged acoss his body, but manages to smack this well enough. Lands in the stands beyond cow corner
back of a length wide outside off, Wildermuth shuffles across to the off side but misses the pull shot. Through to the keeper
full outside off stump, down on one knee as he attempts to slog this towards midwicket, takes the inside edge as the ball flies across to deep backward square instead

misses the paddle sweep, and it cannons into middle stump! Full on off stump, and Webster walked across too much to the off side. Tries to paddle this fine down the leg side, but a feather touch takes it onto his stumps instead. The innovation does not play off
full and wide outside off, driven off the bat's toe end to deep point
back of a length outside off, but angles slightly further away, goes over the tram lines and the umpire chooses to call it a wide
drilled full on off stump, tries to muscled this away but inside edges the shot instead. Ricochets onto his boots, allowing the batsmen to scamper through for the run
great bowling from Worrall today. Another gem outside off that can't be put away. Full ball that Richardson can't get under, takes the outside edge to short third man

another yorker from Worrall! Full outside off, and it's dug away back to the bowler. Takes an awkward bounce off the pitch, but Worrall does well on his follow through to stop the ball from going past him
the extra ball goes for a six! Full toss outside off and it's smacked over the non-striker's head. Maxwell looks to get underneath it at long on, but the ball sails over!
ful outside off,and it's slapped over Hastings' head. Hit flat, but not well enough. Intercepted by long on
great ball. Almost a yorker on off stump, can only dig this out of the blockhole
there's Maxi's fourth! Low full toss outside off, and Wildermuth slogs it towards cow corner down on one knee. It's not off the middle of the bat on this occasion, and easily taken by Maxi once again
overpitched on middle stump, slightly slower on this occasion, mistimes his drive to mid off
full on middle stump, clipped off his toes to deep midwicket, work for the man in the deep
full toss outside off that the batsman meets charging down the wicket, smacked past the bowler to long off. Only six conceded off the over
low full toss on off stump, muscled past Worrall to mid off
full outside off, driven well down the ground, but hit too straight. Crashes into the non-striker's middle stumps
The zing bails light up! 'You miss, I hit' from the bowler. Full on off stump, and Holland misses the straight drive. Takes the top of off stump
good length on middle stump, backs away to carve this square, but misses the shot
chance of a run out, but misses! Full on off stump, and tapped to cover. Sharp work from Zampa, but he misses the direct hit
full on off stump, and muscled away towards the leg side. Intercepted by deep midwicket and Melbourne Stars win by 23 runs. Beat their city rivals to get on the points table
